item.title: Gospel Covenants Bring Promised Blessings
item.description:
Gospel Covenants Bring Promised Blessings by Elder Paul E. Koelliker, Of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 175th Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2005
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Paul E. Koelliker, Of the Seventy

item.title: He Truly Loves Us
item.description:
He Truly Loves Us by Elder Paul E. Koelliker, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Morning of 182nd Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2012
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
